entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 21 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
